name: Reaction Force Constraint
description: Make the reaction force on a trail edge to meet a target force vector.

inputParameters.name: node_key
inputParameters.description: The key of a COMPAS CEM support node.

inputParameters.name: weight
inputParameters.description: The weight of the constraint in the optimization problem. Defaults to one.

outputParameters.name: constraint
outputParameters.description: A COMPAS CEM reaction force constraint.
